TestReportSteps.testObjective: To verify that user is able to update added Crashes.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Invoke the update Crashes API /api/crashdetails. Verify that already added crashes can be updated.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to update Crashes .
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to update Crashes.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to update Crashes.
